actions.name: List versions
actions.description: Lists information about all Identity API versions.

actions.name: Show version details
actions.description: Shows details for the Identity API v2.0.

actions.name: Get extension details
actions.description:
Gets detailed information for a specified extension.
 Specify the extension alias in the URI.

actions.name: Authenticate
actions.description:
Authenticates and generates a token.
 
 The Identity API is a RESTful web service. It is the entry
 point to all service APIs. To access the Identity API, you
 must know its URL.
 
 
 Each REST request against Identity requires the X-Auth-Token
 header. Clients obtain this token, along with the URL to other
 service APIs, by first authenticating against Identity with
 valid credentials.
 
 
 To authenticate, you must provide either a user ID and
 password or a token.
 
 
 If the authentication token has expired, this call returns the
 HTTP 401 status code.
 
 
 If the token specified in the request has expired, this call
 returns the HTTP 404 status code.
 
 
 The Identity API treats expired tokens as no longer valid
 tokens.
 
 
 The deployment determines how long expired tokens are stored.

requests.name: Authenticate with user name and password credentials: JSON request
Authenticate with user name and password credentials: XML request

actions.name: List tenants
actions.description: Lists tenants to which the specified token has access.

limit.description:
Requests a specified page size of returned items from the query.
 Returns a number of items up to the specified limit value. Use the
 limit parameter to make an initial limited request
 and use the ID of the last-seen item from the response as the
 marker parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

marker.description:
Specifies the ID of the last-seen item. Use the limit
 parameter to make an initial limited request and use the ID of the
 last-seen item from the response as the marker
 parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

requests.name: List tenants: HTTP/JSON request
requests.body:
GET /v2.0/tenants HTTP/1.1
Host: identity.api.openstack.org
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: fa8426a0-8eaf-4d22-8e13-7c1b16a9370c
Accept: application/json

GET /v2.0/tenants HTTP/1.1
Host: identity.api.openstack.org
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: fa8426a0-8eaf-4d22-8e13-7c1b16a9370c
Accept: application/json
